attributes.action: Keep Forumla One on the BBC
attributes.additional_details: Formula 1 should stay on BBC and Sky Sports should not be able to take aloud to share F1 under a new rights deal 2012 to 2018. Just because of MR Ecclestone, who is doing it for the money. The BBC has the best coverage by far and that's the way it should stay, PLEASE sign to show your disapproval against this deal.
